Texts.Eng:
Adorable, Omnivorous and nearly electric-proof space rodents. They prowl the stars seeking excitement, and are abnormally brave for rodents. Trustworthy and wise, they've earned a reputation as traders.
    
 Diet: Omnivore 
 
 ^orange;Perks^reset;: 
 +^green;10%^reset; Speed, +^green;10%^reset; Jump
 Resist: ^green;50%^reset; Electric, ^green;20% Fall Damage^reset;
 Great Traders: +^green;21%^reset; Charisma, +500 Start Cash
 Immune: Electrified
 
 ^orange;Weapons^reset;:    
 Striker: +^green;1%^reset; Crit, +^green;5^reset; Crit Dmg
 Scythe: +^green;15%^reset; Protection
 
 ^red;Weaknesses^reset;: 
 -^red;10%^reset; Health
 Weak: -^red;20%^reset; Radioactive, -^red;25%^reset;Poison, -^red;20%^reset; Cosmic
